name: stumblebum
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who often fails or makes mistakes because they have very little ability or skill: He might not be such a stumblebum after all - maybe he has talent.
More examplesFewer examplesI believe in this guy; he is not a stumblebum.He plays a stumblebum who mangles every sentence.Christopher Plummer's performance as an alcoholic stumblebum in the movie was hailed.

often failing or making mistakes because of a lack of ability or skill: Her stumblebum efforts at childcare make for hilarious viewing.
More examplesFewer examplesNot even the most stumblebum troupe of mimes could have put on a funnier show.I lost patience with the film's stumblebum attempts to portray this hypocrite as a martyr and a hero.Will Smith stars as Hancock, a stumblebum boozer who also happens to be able to lift oil tankers and fly through the air.
